column4: well since I'm here anyways... does anyone have experience with SSH and RSA keys?
I'm kind of lost, I can't figure out why I can't log into my server. It just waits after the MOTD, no login request, no prompt
Sure do. But I need help myself right now.
heh, what problem did you run into? =D
Something funny in your bashrc?
hmm... I would hope not 0.o. I never touched it
yeah, I'll have to double check. It has some funny messages in auth.log and the other logs, but I haven't been able to find anything on google
what's the problem with your setup?
Using a PCi video card means I see nothing after BIOS post.
What should be grub countdown is a cursor that jumps around the screen.
have you tried setting the bios option for PCI video card?
heh
Damnit. Sorry.
Yes of course. There are only two options, onboard or PCI
0.o must be a real server lol. I'm just using a junked desktop =D
=/ framebuffer maybe?
What about it?
some cards might not support it. Are you using ubuntu server?
or your own kernel?
This is a brand new gutsy desktop install
gutsy desktop?
I thought it was a SSH problem 0.o
Forget it. I don't think you can help me.
ahaha no, sorry about that
